p: The interference of the test substance with the growth and multiplication of C. albicans ATCC 60193 cells was studied by means of the CFU counting method [ 32, 33]. The effect of the test substance concentrations corresponding to MIC, MICx2, and MICx4 on fungal growth was assessed at various time points: T0 (baseline), T1 (1 hour), T2 (2 hours), T6 (6 hours), T8 (8 hours), T12 (12 hours), and T24 (24 hours).
